code: import axios from'axios';const baseURL='http://localhost:5000';const api=axios.create({baseURL});export const deleteProductApi=async id=>{try{const response=await api.delete("/api/product/".concat(id));return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Ошибка:'+error);throw error;}};export const createProductApi=async(id,productData)=>{try{const response=await api.post("/api/product/".concat(id),productData);return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Ошибка:'+error);throw error;}};export const updateProductApi=async(id,productData)=>{try{const response=await api.put("/api/product/".concat(id),productData);return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Ошибка:'+error);throw error;}};
